message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Bob. But let's be reasonable, I need to make sure I get a fair share too.
You're not in a good position to negotiate, Alice. The money is losing value fast for you.
Okay, Bob, I'm starting to feel the pressure, but I still need to get at least 40. Let's end this!
You're running out of time, Alice. The money is almost worthless to you now. Take what you can get!
